00040 
00051 int os_pci_module( OsInfo osInfo, string pcimapFile )
00052 {
00053   int success;
00054 
00055   // Open file 'modules.pcimap' uploaded to server.
00056   std::ifstream pcimap( pcimapFile.c_str() );
00057   assert(pcimap);               // Oops we failed to open it. Fatal.
00058 
00059   string driver_data;
00060   char coloum_count = 0;        // Holding the column number we are currently reading in 'modules.pcimap' file.
00061   string mod_line, get_s;
00062   
00063   while ( getline(pcimap,mod_line) ){
00064     if ( mod_line[0] == '#' )
00065       continue;                 // If it is a comment, skip it..
00066     
00067     std::istringstream s_in(mod_line);      // Put the line read into a stream.
00068     
00069     PciDevice *pci_dev = new PciDevice();   // Create an object to hold the values of current device read.
00070     
00071     coloum_count = 0;
00072     while ( s_in >> get_s ) {               // Read consequent columns in 'modules.pcimap'.
00073       switch(coloum_count) {
00074       case 0:
00075         pci_dev->setModule(get_s);
00076         break;
00077       case 1:
00078         get_s = get_s.substr(6);
00079         pci_dev->setVendor(get_s);
00080         break;
00081       case 2:
00082         get_s = get_s.substr(6);
00083         pci_dev->setDevice(get_s);
00084         break;
00085       case 3:
00086         get_s = get_s.substr(6);
00087         pci_dev->setSubvendor(get_s);
00088         break;
00089       case 4:
00090         get_s = get_s.substr(6);
00091         pci_dev->setSubdevice(get_s);
00092         break;
00093       case 5:
00094         pci_dev->setClass(get_s.substr(4,2)); // Separately store Class,Subclass and Progif from 'class' column.
00095         pci_dev->setSubclass(get_s.substr(6,2));
00096         pci_dev->setProgif(get_s.substr(8));
00097         break;
00098       case 6:
00099         get_s = get_s.substr(4);
00100         pci_dev->setClassMask(get_s);
00101         break;
00102       case 7:
00103         driver_data = get_s;
00104         break;
00105       }
00106 
00107       ++coloum_count;
00108     }
00109     device_list.push_back(*pci_dev);        // Put the current device read into device_list vector.
00110     delete pci_dev; 
00111   }
00112 
00113 
00114   success = store_pci_map(device_list, osInfo); // Store/Update OS-pcimap_list.
00115   
00116   destroy_device_list();
00117 
00118   return success;
00119 }
00120 
00121 
00123 
00126 void destroy_device_list(void)
00127 {
00128   int device_list_size = device_list.size();
00129   for ( int k=0; k<device_list_size; ++k )
00130     device_list.pop_back();
00131 }
